title: 017: Your Sports Hero is on Anabolic Steroids
description: How prevalent is the use of steroids in sports? Are they as dangerous as they are made out to be? Was Lance Armstrong a cheater or was he just a high profile victim of a political witch hunt? MindPump takes on the controversial topic of steroids in this sure to be debated episode.
